name: Upgrade DJS
content:
Please update your discord.js version with compatible version of sern Handler
It should be above v14.2.0

name: Outdated Node
content: Your nodejs version is outdated, update it to 16.9 or higher

name: Missing Intents
content: If you get an error that says "Missing Intents", you probably want to add them. Don't include intents that you won't use. You can check what intents you need [here](https://ziad87.net/intents/).

name: How2Ask
content:
Often users face issues like commands not loading, message commands not working, slash commands not registering, etc. when they try sern. Please be specific when asking your question and provide all the proper data like code, error, expected behaviour, version, etc.

> Did you use [@sern/cli](<https://www.npmjs.com/@sern/cli>) to generate your project?
> Did you use templates as a reference and create project?
> What version of [discord.js](<https://www.npmjs.com/discord.js>) you are on? Is it v13?
> What version of [@sern/handler](<https://www.npmjs.com/@sern/handler>) you are using?
> Are you using TypeScript or JavaScript?
> Are you using CommonJS or ESM?
